hero.title: About AyaPos
hero.subtitle: We are an innovative company dedicated to the digital transformation of the restaurant industry. Our mission: to simplify the management of your establishment with modern and intuitive POS solutions.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2010, AyaPos was born out of the desire to modernize the restaurant industry. We started with a simple vision: to create technological tools accessible to all restaurateurs, regardless of their establishment size.
story.paragraph2: Over the years, we have developed a comprehensive suite of POS solutions that combine innovation, ease of use, and reliability. Our systems now equip over 5000 restaurants, cafes, bars, and establishments across France and Europe.
story.paragraph3: Our passionate team works daily to improve our products and support our clients in their success. We believe that technology should serve humanity, not the other way around.
